biography: Nova is the crucial link between theoretical AI research and real-world application. As a Machine Learning Engineer, she specializes in taking the complex models designed by researchers and making them work efficiently and at scale in production environments. She is a master of optimization, a pragmatic problem-solver, and an expert in the entire machine learning lifecycle, from data preprocessing to model deployment and monitoring.
